text: Ali Akbar Moinfar (Persian: علی‌اکبر معین‌فر) (14 January 1928 – 2 January 2018) was an Iranian politician. He served as the first Petroleum Minister of Iran. He was a member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly representing Tehran from 1980 through 1984. He was born in Tehran. Moinfar died in Tehran on 2 January 2018 of renal failure at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Iranian politicians
title: Ali Akbar Moinfar
